name: Ratamari: Fall Edition
description:
In Ratamari, you control the Rat King in a pursuit to grow your pumpkin home for all your rat friends. Roll your pumpkin into water puddles to grow it to a suitable size, and gather your rat buddies to gain speed! 

Controls: Press WASD to move!

Credits:

Programmers: Harrison Cote , Alejandro Zapata Acosta 

3D Artist: Ryan Ruxton

2D Artist: Tina Lu

Sound Designer: Alex Larumbe

Composer: Cody Hann

Assets used: ToonWaterShader, Stylized Nature Pack

Submission for the Great Autumn Game Jam: 2021!
